mapper.select: select * from tb_user u left join image i on u.image_id = i.id where u.email = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_user (email, name, pw, address, birth, gender, phone, role, enabled, image_id) values (#{userDto.email}, #{userDto.name}, #{userDto.pw}, #{userDto.address}, #{userDto.birth}, #{userDto.gender}, #{userDto.phone}, #{role}, #{enabled}, #{imageId})
mapper.update: update tb_user set pw = #{pw} where email = #{email}
